text: Practice Problem 3.7 (solution page 364) Consider the following code, in which we have omitted the expression being computed: short scale3(short x, short y, short z) { short t = 5 return t; > Compiling the actual function with ccc yields the following assembly code: short scale3(short x, short y, short z) x in krdi, y in 4rsi, z in krdx scale3: leaq (4rsi,rsi,9), krbx leaq (krbx,4rdx), %rbx leaq (irbx,%rdi,%rsi), %rbx ret Fill in the missing cxpression in the C code.
